segments.text: This drawing captures a typical kitchen moment gone awry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and the sink is overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front of the cabinets like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in the dress and apron is drying dishes, eyes on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped right into the growing puddle but doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are piled up nearby, probably from the meal they just had.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are open, revealing that big cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on the tilting stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, maybe to steady himself or catch falling cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, arm up, clearly begging for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're teaming up behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light from the calm garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Low plants line the path, and there's a fence in the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the slippery floor will make someone slip and fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief could turn into a real accident any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
